data.event: Winter temperatures range from 14 to 27 째F; summer temperatures vary from 45 to 65 째F. Average annual precipitation is 20 inches.
Winter temperatures range from 14 to 27 째F; summer temperatures vary from 45 to 65 째F. Average annual precipitation is 20 inches.
"Hope City" was a mining camp for Resurrection Creek, established in 1896.
Portions of the town were destroyed in the 1964 Good Friday earthquake.
